catList: Optical fiber attenuation and dispersion, light-emitting, laser, and PIN diodes, avalanche photodiodes. Receiver designs, optical power budgets and rise-time budgets, applications in analog and digital communication systems. Optical network model, enabling technologies, physical layer issues,point-to-point transmission, single hop and multihop networks, time-division multiplexed networks, packet-switched optical networks, and application.
